data.title: FURBER, Robin Edward 1949-2023
data.text:
From the Telegraph of 15 April 2023: FURBER Robin died peacefully at home on 8th April. Beloved husband of Toria, father of George and Ellie, father-in-law of Charlotte and Patrick and devoted grandfather to Poppy, Cecilia and Laurie. Private cremation. Thanksgiving Service at the Church of St Margaret the Queen, Buxted on Tuesday 25th April at 11 a.m. Please wear bright clothes. No flowers please, but donations, if desired, to St Peter and St James Hospice, BN8 4ED, or St Wilfrid’s Hospice…

He was s of Stanhope Edward FURBER 1908-87 (s of Edward Price FURBER CBE 1864-1940) of Winkfield, Berks by his 1937 m reg Q3 Berks to Joscelyn Orme 1911-2007 d of Lt-Col H L SCOTT of Hawthorn Lodge, Bracknell, Berks. He m 1979 (Vic)Toria Cecilia b 1951 d of Cdr Thomas Frederick Philip Urquhart PAGE 1918-94 (s of Sir Leo Francis PAGE 1890-1951 sometime head of that gentry family of Newton House and (Edith) Violet LODER-SYMONDS 1891-1973 scion of that gentry family f/o Hinton Waldrist) and Lady Cecilia Norah STOPFORD 1917-2014 d of 7th Earl of COURTOWN 1877-1957 and his wife and third cousin Cicely Mary 1885-1973 d of John Arden BIRCH 1853-1896 and Charlotte Mary Leycester d 1935 d of Maj George Montagu STOPFORD 1828-60 (gs of 3rd Earl of COURTOWN 1765-1835, gt gs of 3rd Duke of BUCCLEUCH 1746-1812 (3xgt gs of King CHARLES II) etc etc) and Caroline Mary 1829-1915 d of FM Sir John Fox BURGOYNE 1st & only Bt GCB 1782-1871 and Charlotte c1796-1871 d of Col Hugh ROSE d 1836 sometime head of that Scots gentry family of Holme, and had a son and a dau as above.
